from message where from_username = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or to_username = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc limit 0,1

from message where msg_type = 49 and app_msg_type = 6 and plaintext like '%${key}%' order by create_time desc
